General.Name: Rock Tech Lithium Inc
General.Description: Rock Tech Lithium Inc. engages in the exploration and development of lithium properties. It holds a 100% interest in the Georgia Lake lithium project comprising 277 claim units and 41 mining leases located in the Thunder Bay Mining District of Ontario. The company focuses on developing and optimizing battery grade lithium hydroxide monohydrate. The company was formerly known as Rock Tech Resources Inc. and changed its name to Rock Tech Lithium Inc. in April 2010. Rock Tech Lithium Inc. was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 777 Hornby Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6Z 1S4
